body_content.explanation: the quality of being uncontrolled, violent, or extreme:
examples: They are no longer able to claim the wildness of youth as any excuse for their behaviour.
There was an almost savage wildness about him.

body_content.explanation: (of plants or animals) the quality of living or growing independently of people, in natural conditions and with natural characteristics:
examples: the wildness of the Western Highlands
The wolves in the area are a symbol of wildness and wilderness.
